description:
A native Android app for NeoDB designed with Material 3/You.

NeoDB You is a native Android app for NeoDB, crafted with Jetpack Compose and Material 3/You.


Features

  • Material 3/You design
  • Native UI
  • Login into any NeoDB servers
  • View trending entries
  • Search with keywords
  • Access detailed information and reviews
  • Compose and modify your own reviews
  • Visualize your library with heat map.

More features on the way...
